author: sunsportonline
title: Graeme Souness has ripped into Arsenal before the clash against Chelsea criticising Arsene Wenger and the squad over their mental strength and soft underbelly
text:
EFL 'More of the same' Graeme Souness has ripped into Arsenal before the clash against Chelsea criticising Arsene Wenger and the squad over their mental strength and soft underbelly 
The Sky Sports pundit believes that the Gunners haven't changed in ten years and do not look like a side that will challenge for the title by jake lambourne
